info.name: Companions
info.description: Companion creatures from the Derpol's Library.

setters.set: Perception +4 plus PB, Stealth +2 plus PB×2, Survival +4 plus PB

description.p: The wolf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

sheet.description: The wolf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

description.p: The wolf has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

sheet.description: The wolf has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

description.p: The wolf's attack rolls score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

sheet.description: The wolf's attack rolls score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

description.p: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

sheet.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

description.p: The wolf can use a bonus action on its turn to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + its level in this class. Once it uses this feature, it must finish a short or long rest before it can use it again.
